page.title: 09LIFESTYLES IN TOFTWOOD
page.content: We decided to carry out a survey to try and find out more about how people lived in our area. To do this we compiled a questionnaire and then visited one house on each street in order to make our sample representative. The area we surveyed is really a collection of housing developments which were built in the late 1960s and 1970s. Bungalows outnumber houses 2:1 in this area nearly all of the buildings had central heating. Most of the people living in Toftwood are either retired people or young married families. It seems that one of the reasons people like to live here is because the price of housing is quite cheap compared to the centre of Dereham or Norwich which is only 16 miles away. The people with children liked it because it was safe and there were schools nearby.
